content: Amid the ongoing pandemics and uncertain macroeconomics, our third quarter net revenues came in at RMB 576.3 (ph) million, up by 3.8% quarter-over-quarter despite 3.3% year-over-year drop. Our third quarter net income reached RMB168.1 million, representing an 81.1% year-over-year increase and a 48% -- 46.7% quarter-over-quarter increase, demonstrating our organization's resilience during tough times like this. Our net revenue reached on the RMB576.2 million during the quarter, exceeding the high end of our guidance reached by 6.7%, despite a slight 3.2% year-over-year decrease, benefiting from our dedicated efforts under major steps in cost control and operational efficiency enhancement. In the third quarter of 2022, operating expenses were RMB325 million, representing a 24.5% decrease from RMB430.6 million in the first quarter of 2021.
